intro: Brachystelma kerzneri, commonly known as the Kerzner’s ice plant, is a succulent species native to South Africa. It features fleshy, triangular leaves that are covered in a fine, white powdery coating, which helps reduce water loss. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and white during the winter months. It is well adapted to arid environments and thrives in full sun. Due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance, it is a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
